QuestData.Title: For Every Soul
QuestData.Description:
Without the Arbiter to stem the flow of souls to the Maw, the Shadowlands will never be fully repaired.
This cannot be the end. Surely you can think of something?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a way to create a new Arbiter.
QuestData.RewardText: A new voice added to the chorus -- the cycle continues ever onward.
